title: pOga viTTup-puram solli
sahitya:
pOga viTTup-puram sollit-tirivadellAm buddhiyum AghAdaDi idu sattiyam AghAdaDi 
punita mAmaiyiliragum Adavum pa ni dha mA enak-kuzhalil pADavum 
kaNicamAgavum AramADavum kaNDOr manamellAm kUDap-pOghavum


anupallavi

  nAgamuDi mEloru naTTamiDuvAn enrum nangaiyar manai shenru koTTamiDuvAn enrum

mundaip-pala pala vinaigaLum aDiyuDan Eka muttu naghaiyAga kottu malarAga 
mukha azhaginil agham negizha negizha mOha mighavAgi vanamidilE
